verses.text: A \add good\add* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* rather to be \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* than \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \add and\add* \w loving|strong="H2896"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* rather than \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 22.1 \ft loving…: or, favour is better than, etc\f*
The \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* and \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* meet \w together|strong="H6298"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w maker|strong="H6213"\w* of them all.

A \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \add man\add* \w foreseeth|strong="H7200"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w hideth|strong="H5641"\w* himself: but the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w*, and are \w punished|strong="H6064"\w*.

\w By|strong="H6118"\w* \w humility|strong="H6038"\w* \add and\add* the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*, and \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.\f + \fr 22.4 \ft By…: or, The reward of humility, etc\f*

\w Thorns|strong="H6791"\w* \add and\add* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w* \add are\add* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w froward|strong="H6141"\w*: he that doth \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from them.

Train \w up|strong="H2596"\w* a \w child|strong="H5288"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* he should \w go|strong="H6310"\w*: and when he is \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, he will not \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from it.\f + \fr 22.6 \ft Train…: or, Catechise\f*\f + \fr 22.6 \ft in…: Heb. in his way\f*

The \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w ruleth|strong="H4910"\w* over the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, and the \w borrower|strong="H3867"\w* \add is\add* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to the \w lender|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 22.7 \ft the lender: Heb. the man that lendeth\f*

He that \w soweth|strong="H2232"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* shall \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w vanity|strong="H0205"\w*: and the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H5678"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 22.8 \ft the rod…: or, with the rod of his anger he shall be consumed\f*

He that hath a \w bountiful|strong="H2896"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*; for he \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* of his \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft He that…: Heb. Good of eye\f*

Cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* the \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w*, and \w contention|strong="H4066"\w* shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*; yea, \w strife|strong="H1779"\w* and \w reproach|strong="H7036"\w* shall \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.

He that \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* \w pureness|strong="H2890"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add for\add* the \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* of his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add shall be\add* his \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft for…: or, and hath grace in his lips\f*

The \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and he \w overthroweth|strong="H5557"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w transgressor|strong="H0898"\w*.\f + \fr 22.12 \ft the words: or, the matters\f*

The \w slothful|strong="H6102"\w* \add man\add* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \add There is\add* a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, I shall be \w slain|strong="H7523"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*.

The \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of strange \w women|strong="H2114"\w* \add is\add* a \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* \w pit|strong="H7745"\w*: he that is \w abhorred|strong="H2194"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* therein.

\w Foolishness|strong="H0200"\w* \add is\add* \w bound|strong="H7194"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of a \w child|strong="H5288"\w*; \add but\add* the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of \w correction|strong="H4148"\w* shall drive it \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from him.

He that \w oppresseth|strong="H6231"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* to \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* his \add riches, and\add* he that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*, \add shall\add* surely \add come\add* to \w want|strong="H4270"\w*.

Bow \w down|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and \w apply|strong="H7896"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* unto my \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

For \add it is\add* a pleasant \w thing|strong="H5273"\w* if thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* them \w within|strong="H0990"\w* thee; they shall \w withal|strong="H3162"\w* be \w fitted|strong="H3559"\w* in thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 22.18 \ft within…: Heb. in thy belly\f*

That thy \w trust|strong="H4009"\w* may be in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have made \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, even to thee.\f + \fr 22.19 \ft even…: or, trust thou also\f*
Have not I \w written|strong="H3789"\w* to \w thee|strong="H8032"\w* excellent \w things|strong="H7991"\w* in \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*,

That I might make thee \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w certainty|strong="H7189"\w* of the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*; that thou mightest \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* to them that \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto thee?\f + \fr 22.21 \ft to them…: or, to those that send thee?\f*

\w Rob|strong="H1497"\w* not the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, because he \add is\add* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*: neither \w oppress|strong="H1792"\w* the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*:

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* their \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, and \w spoil|strong="H6906"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of those that \w spoiled|strong="H6906"\w* them.

Make no \w friendship|strong="H7462"\w* with an \w angry|strong="H0639"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w*; and with a \w furious|strong="H2534"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* thou shalt not \w go|strong="H0935"\w*:
Lest thou \w learn|strong="H0502"\w* his \w ways|strong="H0734"\w*, and \w get|strong="H3947"\w* a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* to thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
Be not thou \add one\add* of them that \w strike|strong="H8628"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \add or\add* of them that are \w sureties|strong="H6148"\w* for \w debts|strong="H4859"\w*.
If thou hast nothing to \w pay|strong="H7999"\w*, why should he take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* from under thee?

\w Remove|strong="H5253"\w* not the \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w landmark|strong="H1366"\w*, which thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w set|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 22.28 \ft landmark: or, bound\f*

\w Seest|strong="H2372"\w* thou a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w diligent|strong="H4106"\w* in his \w business|strong="H4399"\w*? he shall \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*; he shall not \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w mean|strong="H2823"\w* \add men\add*.\f + \fr 22.29 \ft mean…: Heb. obscure men\f*
